function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cross-boundary and cross-sectoral transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased spread of the disease across different regions and sectors","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict containment measures and international cooperation on public health policies","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies and international communication platforms","People":"General public, global organizations, and government leaders","Owner":"Public health authorities and international organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate wastewater management and treatment","Impact":"Contamination of water sources with COVID-19 and other pollutants","Mitigation":"Investment in decentralized wastewater treatment plants, proper monitoring, and effective reuse of treated water","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment technologies and water quality monitoring systems","People":"Wastewater management authorities and environmental organizations","Owner":"Government agencies and private sector partners"},{"Description":"Disruption of building information modeling (BIM) and knowledge management (KM)","Impact":"Reduced efficiency in tracking and responding to COVID-19 through the industry supply chain","Mitigation":"Integration of digital tools for real-time tracking and knowledge management, investment in smart-water infrastructure","Technologies":"Building information modeling (BIM) software, knowledge management systems, and digital tracking tools","People":"Industry professionals and supply chain managers","Owner":"Private sector organizations and technology developers"}]}
